WorkItem.Description:
I have logged in to the website with my Google Open ID URL.
Now DotNEtShoutOut insists that my name is "https://www.google.com/accounts/o8/id?id=AItOawkpelFSXLQRC4BucRyQAbT-31hIRsJNexE".
I cannot change it. Can only change email!!
WorkItem.Summary: DotNetShoutOut: Login With Google Open ID, Name becomes Login URL & Cannot change
